entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
